Consts

svgMulti = 50
Multiplication ratio for converting float to svg coordinates

proc toSVG(p: Vec; annotate: static[char] = 'n'; style: Option[string] = none(string)): XmlNode
Generate svg circle at position p and possibly annotate it with coordinates. Coordinate annotation is controlled using annoate and can take several values ('n' for no annotation, 'r' and 'l' for right and left respectively)
